description: Gets a list of all workspaces associated with an account, specified by ID.

1614665312930232.description: A unique integer ID for the workspace

workspace_name.description: The human-readable name of the workspace.

deployment_name.description: The deployment name defines part of the subdomain for the workspace. The workspace URL for web application and REST APIs is

<deployment-name>.cloud.databricks.com.description: This value must be unique across all non-deleted deployments across all AWS regions.

network_id.description: The network configuration ID that is attached to the workspace. This field is available only if the network is a customer-managed network.

aws_region.description: The AWS region of the workspace data plane (for example,

credentials_id.description: ID of the workspace's credential configuration object.

storage_configuration_id.description: ID of the workspace's storage configuration object.

\"RUNNING\".description: For workspace creation, usually it is set to

PROVISIONING.description: Continue to check the status until the status is

\"Workspace resources are being set up.\.description: Message describing the current workspace status.

managed_services_customer_managed_key_id.description: ID of the key configuration for encrypting managed services.

creation_time.description: Time in epoch milliseconds when the workspace was created.

storage_customer_managed_key_id.description: ID of the key configuration for encrypting workspace storage.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.
